hubl powered search highlighting: <https://www-chargebackgurus-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/glossary?search=card>

it's super simple too:
```{% set keyword = request.query_dict.search %}
{{ content.name|replace(keyword, "<mark>"~keyword~"</mark>") }}```
no css or js required â€” uses the standard html mark element.
